data.name: ErrorAmbiguousSearchScope
data.value: You cannot set "SearchBases" and the legacy option "SearchBase" at the same time. Move all LDAP search bases to the new "SearchBases" property.

data.name: ErrorCheckServerCertIssuer
data.value: The LDAP server certificate "{0}" is expected to be issued by "{1}", but was actually issued by "{2}".

data.name: ErrorEmptySearchBase
data.value: The search base must be a non-empty string.

data.name: ErrorEntryNotFound
data.value: An entry with a value of "{1}" for "{0}" does not exist in the directory.

data.name: ErrorGroupClaim
data.value: Could not set group claims for "{0}".

data.name: ErrorGroupNotFound
data.value: The group with identity "{group}" was not found in the directory.

data.name: ErrorInvalidSid
data.value: The given byte sequence "{0}" does not represent a valid security identifier.

data.name: ErrorLdapOptionsRegistration
data.value: The default LdapOptions cannot be registered as interface, because this would result in an ambiguous constructor call. Use the non-generic variant of AddLdapOptions to register the default options type.

data.name: ErrorLdapPage
data.value: Paging of LDAP search results must start at 0.

data.name: ErrorLdapPageSize
data.value: The size of a page of LDAP search results must be at least 1.

data.name: ErrorMoveNext
data.value: Moving to next LDAP entry failed.

data.name: ErrorPrimaryGroupClaim
data.value: Could not retrieve the primary group claim for "{0}".

data.name: ErrorPropertyNotFound
data.value: The given property "{0}" was not found.

data.name: ErrorPropertyNotMapped
data.value: The given property "{0}" has no LDAP attribute mapped for the current schema "{1}".

data.name: ErrorUnknownServerSelectionPolicy
data.value: The specified server selection policy is not implemented.

data.name: ErrorUserNotFound
data.value: The login succeeded, but your user information could not be retrieved.

data.name: ErrorUserNotFoundDetailed
data.value: The login of "{0}" succeeded, but the user information could not be retrieved. This usually indicates a misconfiguration of the search bases. Make sure that all user accounts that should be able to login are located in one of the configured search bases. Another potential isse is the UserFilter in the application settings not covering all valid input formats for a user name.

data.name: InfoBindAnonymous
data.value: Performing anonyomous bind.

data.name: InfoBindingAsUser
data.value: Performing LDAP bind as user "{0}".

data.name: InfoBoundAnonymous
data.value: Anonymous bind succeeded.

data.name: InfoBoundAsUser
data.value: Authenticated successfully as user "{0}".

data.name: InfoCheckServerCertIssuer
data.value: Checking that the LDAP server certificate "{0}" was issued by "{1}".

data.name: InfoConnectingLdap
data.value: Connecting to LDAP server {0}:{1}.

data.name: InfoServerSelected
data.value: The LDAP server {0} has been selected for a new connection.

data.name: WarnCertCheckDisabled
data.value: LDAP SSL certificate check has been disabled.

data.name: WarnNoFallback
data.value: There is no redundant LDAP server left to fall back to that has not been blacklisted.

data.name: WarnServerBlacklisted
data.value: The LDAP server {0} has been blacklisted until {1}.
